The report design I used is attached.

In fact, any report design file (even the blank one) can be used to reproduce the problem.
Yes, this bug has been found by Yuejie. After Eclipse 3.3M5, it will happen.

Meant what?
It's our bug or?

That is a SWT bug. Eclipse 3.3M5 have two versions:3.3M5 and 3.3M5eh. It only products by eclipse 3.3M5, but in eclipse 3.3M5eh, it work normally.
Could you provide the no of that swt bug?
